00049 static void bm_loop_attrs_copy(BMesh *source_mesh, BMesh *target_mesh,
00050                                const BMLoop *source_loop, BMLoop *target_loop);

00066 BMFace *BM_face_create_quad_tri(BMesh *bm,
00067                                 BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2, BMVert *v3, BMVert *v4,
00068                                 const BMFace *example, const int nodouble)
00069 {
00070     BMVert *vtar[4] = {v1, v2, v3, v4};
00071     return BM_face_create_quad_tri_v(bm, vtar, v4 ? 4 : 3, example, nodouble);
00072 }
00073 
00074 BMFace *BM_face_create_quad_tri_v(BMesh *bm, BMVert **verts, int len, const BMFace *example, const int nodouble)
00075 {
00076     BMFace *f = NULL;
00077     int is_overlap = FALSE;
00078 
00079     /* sanity check - debug mode only */
00080     if (len == 3) {
00081         BLI_assert(verts[0] != verts[1]);
00082         BLI_assert(verts[0] != verts[2]);
00083         BLI_assert(verts[1] != verts[2]);
00084     }
00085     else if (len == 4) {
00086         BLI_assert(verts[0] != verts[1]);
00087         BLI_assert(verts[0] != verts[2]);
00088         BLI_assert(verts[0] != verts[3]);
00089 
00090         BLI_assert(verts[1] != verts[2]);
00091         BLI_assert(verts[1] != verts[3]);
00092 
00093         BLI_assert(verts[2] != verts[3]);
00094     }
00095     else {
00096         BLI_assert(0);
00097     }
00098 
00099 
00100     if (nodouble) {
00101         /* check if face exists or overlaps */
00102         is_overlap = BM_face_exists(bm, verts, len, &f);
00103     }
00104 
00105     /* make new face */
00106     if ((f == NULL) && (!is_overlap)) {
00107         BMEdge *edar[4] = {NULL};
00108         edar[0] = BM_edge_create(bm, verts[0], verts[1], NULL, TRUE);
00109         edar[1] = BM_edge_create(bm, verts[1], verts[2], NULL, TRUE);
00110         if (len == 4) {
00111             edar[2] = BM_edge_create(bm, verts[2], verts[3], NULL, TRUE);
00112             edar[3] = BM_edge_create(bm, verts[3], verts[0], NULL, TRUE);
00113         }
00114         else {
00115             edar[2] = BM_edge_create(bm, verts[2], verts[0], NULL, TRUE);
00116         }
00117 
00118         f = BM_face_create(bm, verts, edar, len, FALSE);
00119 
00120         if (example && f) {
00121             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, example, f);
00122         }
00123     }
00124 
00125     return f;
00126 }
00127 
00133 void BM_face_copy_shared(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f)
00134 {
00135     BMLoop *l_first;
00136     BMLoop *l_iter;
00137 
00138     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00139     do {
00140         BMLoop *l_other = l_iter->radial_next;
00141 
00142         if (l_other && l_other != l_iter) {
00143             if (l_other->v == l_iter->v) {
00144                 bm_loop_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_other, l_iter);
00145                 bm_loop_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_other->next, l_iter->next);
00146             }
00147             else {
00148                 bm_loop_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_other->next, l_iter);
00149                 bm_loop_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_other, l_iter->next);
00150             }
00151             /* since we copy both loops of the shared edge, step over the next loop here */
00152             if ((l_iter = l_iter->next) == l_first) {
00153                 break;
00154             }
00155         }
00156     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00157 }
00158 
00174 BMFace *BM_face_create_ngon(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2, BMEdge **edges, int len, int nodouble)
00175 {
00176     BMEdge **edges2 = NULL;
00177     BLI_array_staticdeclare(edges2, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00178     BMVert **verts = NULL;
00179     BLI_array_staticdeclare(verts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00180     BMFace *f = NULL;
00181     BMEdge *e;
00182     BMVert *v, *ev1, *ev2;
00183     int i, /* j, */ v1found, reverse;
00184 
00185     /* this code is hideous, yeek.  I'll have to think about ways of
00186      *  cleaning it up.  basically, it now combines the old BM_face_create_ngon
00187      *  _and_ the old bmesh_mf functions, so its kindof smashed together
00188      * - joeedh */
00189 
00190     if (!len || !v1 || !v2 || !edges || !bm)
00191         return NULL;
00192 
00193     /* put edges in correct order */
00194     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00195         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_ENABLE(edges[i], _FLAG_MF);
00196     }
00197 
00198     ev1 = edges[0]->v1;
00199     ev2 = edges[0]->v2;
00200 
00201     if (v1 == ev2) {
00202         /* Swapping here improves performance and consistency of face
00203          * structure in the special case that the edges are already in
00204          * the correct order and winding */
00205         SWAP(BMVert *, ev1, ev2);
00206     }
00207 
00208     BLI_array_append(verts, ev1);
00209     v = ev2;
00210     e = edges[0];
00211     do {
00212         BMEdge *e2 = e;
00213 
00214         BLI_array_append(verts, v);
00215         BLI_array_append(edges2, e);
00216 
00217         do {
00218             e2 = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e2, v);
00219             if (e2 != e && BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(e2, _FLAG_MF)) {
00220                 v = BM_edge_other_vert(e2, v);
00221                 break;
00222             }
00223         } while (e2 != e);
00224 
00225         if (e2 == e)
00226             goto err; /* the edges do not form a closed loop */
00227 
00228         e = e2;
00229     } while (e != edges[0]);
00230 
00231     if (BLI_array_count(edges2) != len) {
00232         goto err; /* we didn't use all edges in forming the boundary loop */
00233     }
00234 
00235     /* ok, edges are in correct order, now ensure they are going
00236      * in the correct direction */
00237     v1found = reverse = FALSE;
00238     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00239         if (BM_vert_in_edge(edges2[i], v1)) {
00240             /* see if v1 and v2 are in the same edge */
00241             if (BM_vert_in_edge(edges2[i], v2)) {
00242                 /* if v1 is shared by the *next* edge, then the winding
00243                  * is incorrect */
00244                 if (BM_vert_in_edge(edges2[(i + 1) % len], v1)) {
00245                     reverse = TRUE;
00246                     break;
00247                 }
00248             }
00249 
00250             v1found = TRUE;
00251         }
00252 
00253         if ((v1found == FALSE) && BM_vert_in_edge(edges2[i], v2)) {
00254             reverse = TRUE;
00255             break;
00256         }
00257     }
00258 
00259     if (reverse) {
00260         for (i = 0; i < len / 2; i++) {
00261             v = verts[i];
00262             verts[i] = verts[len - i - 1];
00263             verts[len - i - 1] = v;
00264         }
00265     }
00266 
00267     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00268         edges2[i] = BM_edge_exists(verts[i], verts[(i + 1) % len]);
00269         if (!edges2[i]) {
00270             goto err;
00271         }
00272     }
00273 
00274     f = BM_face_create(bm, verts, edges2, len, nodouble);
00275 
00276     /* clean up flags */
00277     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00278         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_DISABLE(edges2[i], _FLAG_MF);
00279     }
00280 
00281     BLI_array_free(verts);
00282     BLI_array_free(edges2);
00283 
00284     return f;
00285 
00286 err:
00287     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00288         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_DISABLE(edges[i], _FLAG_MF);
00289     }
00290 
00291     BLI_array_free(verts);
00292     BLI_array_free(edges2);
00293 
00294     return NULL;
00295 }
00296 
00297 typedef struct AngleIndexPair {
00298     float angle;
00299     int index;
00300 } AngleIndexPair;
00301 
00302 static int angle_index_pair_cmp(const void *e1, const void *e2)
00303 {
00304     const AngleIndexPair *p1 = e1, *p2 = e2;
00305     if      (p1->angle > p2->angle) return  1;
00306     else if (p1->angle < p2->angle) return -1;
00307     else return 0;
00308 }
00309 
00326 BMFace *BM_face_create_ngon_vcloud(BMesh *bm, BMVert **vert_arr, int totv, int nodouble)
00327 {
00328     BMFace *f;
00329 
00330     float totv_inv = 1.0f / (float)totv;
00331     int i = 0;
00332 
00333     float cent[3], nor[3];
00334 
00335     float *far = NULL, *far_cross = NULL;
00336 
00337     float far_vec[3];
00338     float far_cross_vec[3];
00339     float sign_vec[3]; /* work out if we are pos/neg angle */
00340 
00341     float far_dist, far_best;
00342     float far_cross_dist, far_cross_best = 0.0f;
00343 
00344     AngleIndexPair *vang;
00345 
00346     BMVert **vert_arr_map;
00347     BMEdge **edge_arr;
00348     int i_prev;
00349 
00350     unsigned int winding[2] = {0, 0};
00351 
00352     /* get the center point and collect vector array since we loop over these a lot */
00353     zero_v3(cent);
00354     for (i = 0; i < totv; i++) {
00355         madd_v3_v3fl(cent, vert_arr[i]->co, totv_inv);
00356     }
00357 
00358 
00359     /* find the far point from cent */
00360     far_best = 0.0f;
00361     for (i = 0; i < totv; i++) {
00362         far_dist = len_squared_v3v3(vert_arr[i]->co, cent);
00363         if (far_dist > far_best || far == NULL) {
00364             far = vert_arr[i]->co;
00365             far_best = far_dist;
00366         }
00367     }
00368 
00369     sub_v3_v3v3(far_vec, far, cent);
00370     far_dist = len_v3(far_vec); /* real dist */
00371 
00372     /* --- */
00373 
00374     /* find a point 90deg about to compare with */
00375     far_cross_best = 0.0f;
00376     for (i = 0; i < totv; i++) {
00377 
00378         if (far == vert_arr[i]->co) {
00379             continue;
00380         }
00381 
00382         sub_v3_v3v3(far_cross_vec, vert_arr[i]->co, cent);
00383         far_cross_dist = normalize_v3(far_cross_vec);
00384 
00385         /* more of a weight then a distance */
00386         far_cross_dist = (/* first we want to have a value close to zero mapped to 1 */
00387                           1.0 - fabsf(dot_v3v3(far_vec, far_cross_vec)) *
00388 
00389                           /* second  we multiply by the distance
00390                            * so points close to the center are not preferred */
00391                           far_cross_dist);
00392 
00393         if (far_cross_dist > far_cross_best || far_cross == NULL) {
00394             far_cross = vert_arr[i]->co;
00395             far_cross_best = far_cross_dist;
00396         }
00397     }
00398 
00399     sub_v3_v3v3(far_cross_vec, far_cross, cent);
00400 
00401     /* --- */
00402 
00403     /* now we have 2 vectors we can have a cross product */
00404     cross_v3_v3v3(nor, far_vec, far_cross_vec);
00405     normalize_v3(nor);
00406     cross_v3_v3v3(sign_vec, far_vec, nor); /* this vector should match 'far_cross_vec' closely */
00407 
00408     /* --- */
00409 
00410     /* now calculate every points angle around the normal (signed) */
00411     vang = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(AngleIndexPair) * totv, __func__);
00412 
00413     for (i = 0; i < totv; i++) {
00414         float co[3];
00415         float proj_vec[3];
00416         float angle;
00417 
00418         /* center relative vec */
00419         sub_v3_v3v3(co, vert_arr[i]->co, cent);
00420 
00421         /* align to plane */
00422         project_v3_v3v3(proj_vec, co, nor);
00423         sub_v3_v3(co, proj_vec);
00424 
00425         /* now 'co' is valid - we can compare its angle against the far vec */
00426         angle = angle_v3v3(far_vec, co);
00427 
00428         if (dot_v3v3(co, sign_vec) < 0.0f) {
00429             angle = -angle;
00430         }
00431 
00432         vang[i].angle = angle;
00433         vang[i].index = i;
00434     }
00435 
00436     /* sort by angle and magic! - we have our ngon */
00437     qsort(vang, totv, sizeof(AngleIndexPair), angle_index_pair_cmp);
00438 
00439     /* --- */
00440 
00441     /* create edges and find the winding (if faces are attached to any existing edges) */
00442     vert_arr_map = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(BMVert **) * totv, __func__);
00443     edge_arr = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(BMEdge **) * totv, __func__);
00444 
00445     for (i = 0; i < totv; i++) {
00446         vert_arr_map[i] = vert_arr[vang[i].index];
00447     }
00448     MEM_freeN(vang);
00449 
00450     i_prev = totv - 1;
00451     for (i = 0; i < totv; i++) {
00452         edge_arr[i] = BM_edge_create(bm, vert_arr_map[i_prev], vert_arr_map[i], NULL, TRUE);
00453 
00454         /* the edge may exist already and be attached to a face
00455          * in this case we can find the best winding to use for the new face */
00456         if (edge_arr[i]->l) {
00457             BMVert *test_v1, *test_v2;
00458             /* we want to use the reverse winding to the existing order */
00459             BM_edge_ordered_verts(edge_arr[i], &test_v2, &test_v1);
00460             winding[(vert_arr_map[i_prev] == test_v2)]++;
00461 
00462         }
00463 
00464         i_prev = i;
00465     }
00466 
00467     /* --- */
00468 
00469     if (winding[0] < winding[1]) {
00470         winding[0] = 1;
00471         winding[1] = 0;
00472     }
00473     else {
00474         winding[0] = 0;
00475         winding[1] = 1;
00476     }
00477 
00478     /* --- */
00479 
00480     /* create the face */
00481     f = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, vert_arr_map[winding[0]], vert_arr_map[winding[1]], edge_arr, totv, nodouble);
00482 
00483     MEM_freeN(edge_arr);
00484     MEM_freeN(vert_arr_map);
00485 
00486     return f;
00487 }

00493 void BMO_remove_tagged_faces(BMesh *bm, const short oflag)
00494 {
00495     BMFace *f;
00496     BMIter iter;
00497 
00498     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00499         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, oflag)) {
00500             BM_face_kill(bm, f);
00501         }
00502     }
00503 }
00504 
00505 void BMO_remove_tagged_edges(BMesh *bm, const short oflag)
00506 {
00507     BMEdge *e;
00508     BMIter iter;
00509 
00510     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00511         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, oflag)) {
00512             BM_edge_kill(bm, e);
00513         }
00514     }
00515 }
00516 
00517 void BMO_remove_tagged_verts(BMesh *bm, const short oflag)
00518 {
00519     BMVert *v;
00520     BMIter iter;
00521 
00522     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00523         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, oflag)) {
00524             BM_vert_kill(bm, v);
00525         }
00526     }
00527 }
00528 
00529 /*************************************************************/
00530 /* you need to make remove tagged verts/edges/faces
00531  * api functions that take a filter callback.....
00532  * and this new filter type will be for opstack flags.
00533  * This is because the BM_remove_taggedXXX functions bypass iterator API.
00534  *  - Ops don't care about 'UI' considerations like selection state, hide state, etc.
00535  *    If you want to work on unhidden selections for instance,
00536  *    copy output from a 'select context' operator to another operator....
00537  */
00538 
00539 static void bmo_remove_tagged_context_verts(BMesh *bm, const short oflag)
00540 {
00541     BMVert *v;
00542     BMEdge *e;
00543     BMFace *f;
00544 
00545     BMIter iter;
00546     BMIter itersub;
00547 
00548     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00549         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, oflag)) {
00550             /* Visit edge */
00551             BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &itersub, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00552                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, oflag);
00553             }
00554             /* Visit face */
00555             BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &itersub, v, BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
00556                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, oflag);
00557             }
00558         }
00559     }
00560 
00561     BMO_remove_tagged_faces(bm, oflag);
00562     BMO_remove_tagged_edges(bm, oflag);
00563     BMO_remove_tagged_verts(bm, oflag);
00564 }
00565 
00566 static void bmo_remove_tagged_context_edges(BMesh *bm, const short oflag)
00567 {
00568     BMEdge *e;
00569     BMFace *f;
00570 
00571     BMIter iter;
00572     BMIter itersub;
00573 
00574     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00575         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, oflag)) {
00576             BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &itersub, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00577                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, oflag);
00578             }
00579         }
00580     }
00581     BMO_remove_tagged_faces(bm, oflag);
00582     BMO_remove_tagged_edges(bm, oflag);
00583 }
00584 
00585 #define DEL_WIREVERT    (1 << 10)
00586 
00593 void BMO_remove_tagged_context(BMesh *bm, const short oflag, const int type)
00594 {
00595     BMVert *v;
00596     BMEdge *e;
00597     BMFace *f;
00598 
00599     BMIter viter;
00600     BMIter eiter;
00601     BMIter fiter;
00602 
00603     switch (type) {
00604         case DEL_VERTS:
00605         {
00606             bmo_remove_tagged_context_verts(bm, oflag);
00607 
00608             break;
00609         }
00610         case DEL_EDGES:
00611         {
00612             /* flush down to vert */
00613             BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00614                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, oflag)) {
00615                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v1, oflag);
00616                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v2, oflag);
00617                 }
00618             }
00619             bmo_remove_tagged_context_edges(bm, oflag);
00620             /* remove loose vertice */
00621             BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00622                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, oflag) && (!(v->e)))
00623                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, DEL_WIREVERT);
00624             }
00625             BMO_remove_tagged_verts(bm, DEL_WIREVERT);
00626 
00627             break;
00628         }
00629         case DEL_EDGESFACES:
00630         {
00631             bmo_remove_tagged_context_edges(bm, oflag);
00632 
00633             break;
00634         }
00635         case DEL_ONLYFACES:
00636         {
00637             BMO_remove_tagged_faces(bm, oflag);
00638 
00639             break;
00640         }
00641         case DEL_ONLYTAGGED:
00642         {
00643             BMO_remove_tagged_faces(bm, oflag);
00644             BMO_remove_tagged_edges(bm, oflag);
00645             BMO_remove_tagged_verts(bm, oflag);
00646 
00647             break;
00648         }
00649         case DEL_FACES:
00650         {
00651             /* go through and mark all edges and all verts of all faces for delet */
00652             BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00653                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, oflag)) {
00654                     for (e = BM_iter_new(&eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_FACE, f); e; e = BM_iter_step(&eiter))
00655                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, oflag);
00656                     for (v = BM_iter_new(&viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_FACE, f); v; v = BM_iter_step(&viter))
00657                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, oflag);
00658                 }
00659             }
00660             /* now go through and mark all remaining faces all edges for keeping */
00661             BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00662                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, oflag)) {
00663                     for (e = BM_iter_new(&eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_FACE, f); e; e = BM_iter_step(&eiter)) {
00664                         BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e, oflag);
00665                     }
00666                     for (v = BM_iter_new(&viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_FACE, f); v; v = BM_iter_step(&viter)) {
00667                         BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, v, oflag);
00668                     }
00669                 }
00670             }
00671             /* also mark all the vertices of remaining edges for keeping */
00672             BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00673                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, oflag)) {
00674                     BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e->v1, oflag);
00675                     BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e->v2, oflag);
00676                 }
00677             }
00678             /* now delete marked face */
00679             BMO_remove_tagged_faces(bm, oflag);
00680             /* delete marked edge */
00681             BMO_remove_tagged_edges(bm, oflag);
00682             /* remove loose vertice */
00683             BMO_remove_tagged_verts(bm, oflag);
00684 
00685             break;
00686         }
00687         case DEL_ALL:
00688         {
00689             /* does this option even belong in here? */
00690             BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00691                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, oflag);
00692             }
00693             BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00694                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, oflag);
00695             }
00696             BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00697                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, oflag);
00698             }
00699 
00700             BMO_remove_tagged_faces(bm, oflag);
00701             BMO_remove_tagged_edges(bm, oflag);
00702             BMO_remove_tagged_verts(bm, oflag);
00703 
00704             break;
00705         }
00706     }
00707 }
00708 /*************************************************************/
00709 
00710 
00711 static void bm_vert_attrs_copy(BMesh *source_mesh, BMesh *target_mesh,
00712                                const BMVert *source_vertex, BMVert *target_vertex)
00713 {
00714     if ((source_mesh == target_mesh) && (source_vertex == target_vertex)) {
00715         return;
00716     }
00717     copy_v3_v3(target_vertex->no, source_vertex->no);
00718     CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&target_mesh->vdata, &target_vertex->head.data);
00719     CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&source_mesh->vdata, &target_mesh->vdata,
00720                                source_vertex->head.data, &target_vertex->head.data);
00721 }
00722 
00723 static void bm_edge_attrs_copy(BMesh *source_mesh, BMesh *target_mesh,
00724                                const BMEdge *source_edge, BMEdge *target_edge)
00725 {
00726     if ((source_mesh == target_mesh) && (source_edge == target_edge)) {
00727         return;
00728     }
00729     CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&target_mesh->edata, &target_edge->head.data);
00730     CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&source_mesh->edata, &target_mesh->edata,
00731                                source_edge->head.data, &target_edge->head.data);
00732 }
00733 
00734 static void bm_loop_attrs_copy(BMesh *source_mesh, BMesh *target_mesh,
00735                                const BMLoop *source_loop, BMLoop *target_loop)
00736 {
00737     if ((source_mesh == target_mesh) && (source_loop == target_loop)) {
00738         return;
00739     }
00740     CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&target_mesh->ldata, &target_loop->head.data);
00741     CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&source_mesh->ldata, &target_mesh->ldata,
00742                                source_loop->head.data, &target_loop->head.data);
00743 }
00744 
00745 static void bm_face_attrs_copy(BMesh *source_mesh, BMesh *target_mesh,
00746                                const BMFace *source_face, BMFace *target_face)
00747 {
00748     if ((source_mesh == target_mesh) && (source_face == target_face)) {
00749         return;
00750     }
00751     copy_v3_v3(target_face->no, source_face->no);
00752     CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&target_mesh->pdata, &target_face->head.data);
00753     CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&source_mesh->pdata, &target_mesh->pdata,
00754                                source_face->head.data, &target_face->head.data);
00755     target_face->mat_nr = source_face->mat_nr;
00756 }
00757 
00758 /* BMESH_TODO: Special handling for hide flags? */
00759 
00764 void BM_elem_attrs_copy(BMesh *source_mesh, BMesh *target_mesh, const void *source, void *target)
00765 {
00766     const BMHeader *sheader = source;
00767     BMHeader *theader = target;
00768 
00769     BLI_assert(sheader->htype == theader->htype);
00770 
00771     if (sheader->htype != theader->htype)
00772         return;
00773 
00774     /* First we copy select */
00775     if (BM_elem_flag_test((BMElem *)sheader, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00776         BM_elem_select_set(target_mesh, (BMElem *)target, TRUE);
00777     }
00778     
00779     /* Now we copy flags */
00780     theader->hflag = sheader->hflag;
00781     
00782     /* Copy specific attributes */
00783     switch (theader->htype) {
00784         case BM_VERT:
00785             bm_vert_attrs_copy(source_mesh, target_mesh, (const BMVert *)source, (BMVert *)target);
00786             break;
00787         case BM_EDGE:
00788             bm_edge_attrs_copy(source_mesh, target_mesh, (const BMEdge *)source, (BMEdge *)target);
00789             break;
00790         case BM_LOOP:
00791             bm_loop_attrs_copy(source_mesh, target_mesh, (const BMLoop *)source, (BMLoop *)target);
00792             break;
00793         case BM_FACE:
00794             bm_face_attrs_copy(source_mesh, target_mesh, (const BMFace *)source, (BMFace *)target);
00795             break;
00796         default:
00797             BLI_assert(0);
00798     }
00799 }
00800 
00801 BMesh *BM_mesh_copy(BMesh *bm_old)
00802 {
00803     BMesh *bm_new;
00804     BMVert *v, *v2, **vtable = NULL;
00805     BMEdge *e, *e2, **edges = NULL, **etable = NULL;
00806     BMElem **eletable;
00807     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00808     BMLoop *l, /* *l2, */ **loops = NULL;
00809     BLI_array_declare(loops);
00810     BMFace *f, *f2, **ftable = NULL;
00811     BMEditSelection *ese;
00812     BMIter iter, liter;
00813     int i, j;
00814     BMAllocTemplate allocsize = {bm_old->totvert,
00815                                  bm_old->totedge,
00816                                  bm_old->totloop,
00817                                  bm_old->totface};
00818 
00819     /* allocate a bmesh */
00820     bm_new = BM_mesh_create(&allocsize);
00821 
00822     CustomData_copy(&bm_old->vdata, &bm_new->vdata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00823     CustomData_copy(&bm_old->edata, &bm_new->edata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00824     CustomData_copy(&bm_old->ldata, &bm_new->ldata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00825     CustomData_copy(&bm_old->pdata, &bm_new->pdata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00826 
00827     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm_new->vdata, allocsize.totvert, BM_VERT);
00828     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm_new->edata, allocsize.totedge, BM_EDGE);
00829     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm_new->ldata, allocsize.totloop, BM_LOOP);
00830     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm_new->pdata, allocsize.totface, BM_FACE);
00831 
00832     vtable = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(BMVert *) * bm_old->totvert, "BM_mesh_copy vtable");
00833     etable = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(BMEdge *) * bm_old->totedge, "BM_mesh_copy etable");
00834     ftable = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(BMFace *) * bm_old->totface, "BM_mesh_copy ftable");
00835 
00836     v = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm_old, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
00837     for (i = 0; v; v = BM_iter_step(&iter), i++) {
00838         v2 = BM_vert_create(bm_new, v->co, NULL); /* copy between meshes so cant use 'example' argument */
00839         BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm_old, bm_new, v, v2);
00840         vtable[i] = v2;
00841         BM_elem_index_set(v, i); /* set_inline */
00842         BM_elem_index_set(v2, i); /* set_inline */
00843     }
00844     bm_old->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_VERT;
00845     bm_new->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_VERT;
00846 
00847     /* safety check */
00848     BLI_assert(i == bm_old->totvert);
00849     
00850     e = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm_old, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00851     for (i = 0; e; e = BM_iter_step(&iter), i++) {
00852         e2 = BM_edge_create(bm_new,
00853                             vtable[BM_elem_index_get(e->v1)],
00854                             vtable[BM_elem_index_get(e->v2)],
00855                             e, FALSE);
00856 
00857         BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm_old, bm_new, e, e2);
00858         etable[i] = e2;
00859         BM_elem_index_set(e, i); /* set_inline */
00860         BM_elem_index_set(e2, i); /* set_inline */
00861     }
00862     bm_old->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_EDGE;
00863     bm_new->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_EDGE;
00864 
00865     /* safety check */
00866     BLI_assert(i == bm_old->totedge);
00867     
00868     f = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm_old, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00869     for (i = 0; f; f = BM_iter_step(&iter), i++) {
00870         BM_elem_index_set(f, i); /* set_inline */
00871 
00872         BLI_array_empty(loops);
00873         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00874         BLI_array_growitems(loops, f->len);
00875         BLI_array_growitems(edges, f->len);
00876 
00877         l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm_old, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f);
00878         for (j = 0; j < f->len; j++, l = BM_iter_step(&liter)) {
00879             loops[j] = l;
00880             edges[j] = etable[BM_elem_index_get(l->e)];
00881         }
00882 
00883         v = vtable[BM_elem_index_get(loops[0]->v)];
00884         v2 = vtable[BM_elem_index_get(loops[1]->v)];
00885 
00886         if (!bmesh_verts_in_edge(v, v2, edges[0])) {
00887             v = vtable[BM_elem_index_get(loops[BLI_array_count(loops) - 1]->v)];
00888             v2 = vtable[BM_elem_index_get(loops[0]->v)];
00889         }
00890 
00891         f2 = BM_face_create_ngon(bm_new, v, v2, edges, f->len, FALSE);
00892         if (!f2)
00893             continue;
00894         /* use totface in case adding some faces fails */
00895         BM_elem_index_set(f2, (bm_new->totface - 1)); /* set_inline */
00896 
00897         ftable[i] = f2;
00898 
00899         BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm_old, bm_new, f, f2);
00900         copy_v3_v3(f2->no, f->no);
00901 
00902         l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm_new, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f2);
00903         for (j = 0; j < f->len; j++, l = BM_iter_step(&liter)) {
00904             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm_old, bm_new, loops[j], l);
00905         }
00906 
00907         if (f == bm_old->act_face) bm_new->act_face = f2;
00908     }
00909     bm_old->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_FACE;
00910     bm_new->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_FACE;
00911 
00912     /* safety check */
00913     BLI_assert(i == bm_old->totface);
00914 
00915     /* copy over edit selection history */
00916     for (ese = bm_old->selected.first; ese; ese = ese->next) {
00917         BMElem *ele = NULL;
00918 
00919         switch (ese->htype) {
00920             case BM_VERT:
00921                 eletable = (BMElem **)vtable;
00922                 break;
00923             case BM_EDGE:
00924                 eletable = (BMElem **)etable;
00925                 break;
00926             case BM_FACE:
00927                 eletable = (BMElem **)ftable;
00928                 break;
00929             default:
00930                 eletable = NULL;
00931                 break;
00932         }
00933 
00934         if (eletable) {
00935             ele = eletable[BM_elem_index_get(ese->ele)];
00936             if (ele) {
00937                 BM_select_history_store(bm_new, ele);
00938             }
00939         }
00940     }
00941 
00942     MEM_freeN(etable);
00943     MEM_freeN(vtable);
00944     MEM_freeN(ftable);
00945 
00946     BLI_array_free(loops);
00947     BLI_array_free(edges);
00948 
00949     return bm_new;
00950 }
00951 
00952 /* ME -> BM */
00953 char BM_vert_flag_from_mflag(const char  meflag)
00954 {
00955     return ( ((meflag & SELECT)       ? BM_ELEM_SELECT : 0) |
00956              ((meflag & ME_HIDE)      ? BM_ELEM_HIDDEN : 0)
00957              );
00958 }
00959 char BM_edge_flag_from_mflag(const short meflag)
00960 {
00961     return ( ((meflag & SELECT)        ? BM_ELEM_SELECT : 0) |
00962              ((meflag & ME_SEAM)       ? BM_ELEM_SEAM   : 0) |
00963              ((meflag & ME_SHARP) == 0 ? BM_ELEM_SMOOTH : 0) | /* invert */
00964              ((meflag & ME_HIDE)       ? BM_ELEM_HIDDEN : 0)
00965              );
00966 }
00967 char BM_face_flag_from_mflag(const char  meflag)
00968 {
00969     return ( ((meflag & ME_FACE_SEL)  ? BM_ELEM_SELECT : 0) |
00970              ((meflag & ME_SMOOTH)    ? BM_ELEM_SMOOTH : 0) |
00971              ((meflag & ME_HIDE)      ? BM_ELEM_HIDDEN : 0)
00972              );
00973 }
00974 
00975 /* BM -> ME */
00976 char  BM_vert_flag_to_mflag(BMVert *eve)
00977 {
00978     const char hflag = eve->head.hflag;
00979 
00980     return ( ((hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT)  ? SELECT  : 0) |
00981              ((hflag & BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)  ? ME_HIDE : 0)
00982              );
00983 }
00984 short BM_edge_flag_to_mflag(BMEdge *eed)
00985 {
00986     const char hflag = eed->head.hflag;
00987 
00988     return ( ((hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT)       ? SELECT    : 0) |
00989              ((hflag & BM_ELEM_SEAM)         ? ME_SEAM   : 0) |
00990              ((hflag & BM_ELEM_SMOOTH) == 0  ? ME_SHARP  : 0) |
00991              ((hflag & BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)       ? ME_HIDE   : 0) |
00992              ((BM_edge_is_wire(eed)) ? ME_LOOSEEDGE : 0) | /* not typical */
00993              (ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER)
00994              );
00995 }
00996 char  BM_face_flag_to_mflag(BMFace *efa)
00997 {
00998     const char hflag = efa->head.hflag;
00999 
01000     return ( ((hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT) ? ME_FACE_SEL : 0) |
01001              ((hflag & BM_ELEM_SMOOTH) ? ME_SMOOTH   : 0) |
01002              ((hflag & BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) ? ME_HIDE     : 0)
01003              );
01004 }
